message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position as [Your Position] at [Company Name]. This was not an easy decision for me, but I feel that it is necessary for personal and professional reasons.

Over the past [X] years, I have been dedicated to the success of our company and have worked hard to contribute to its growth and success. However, due to [reasons], I have come to the realization that this position is no longer aligning with my career goals and aspirations.

I want to thank you for the opportunities that I have had while working here, and I am grateful for the experience and knowledge gained during my time at the company. I will always appreciate the support and guidance provided by you and the rest of the team.

My last day of work will be [Date]. I will do everything possible to ensure a smooth transition of my responsibilities and complete any outstanding tasks before my departure. If there is anything specific that you would like me to focus on during this time, please let me know.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
